item.title: F1_Score
item.description: F1 Score 2022-05-05 Tags: #F1Score The traditional F-measure or balanced F-score (F1 score) is the Harmonic_Mean-调和平均数 of Precision Recall: $$F_{1}=\frac{2}{\text { recall }^{-1}+\text { precision }^{-1}}=2 \cdot \frac{\text { precision } \cdot \text { recall }}{\text { precision }+\text { recall }}=\frac{\text { tp }}{t p+\frac{1}{2}(\mathrm{fp}+\mathrm{fn})}$$
